tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_material_id UUID,
    product_measurement VARCHAR(50),
    product_color VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_id INT REFERENCES materials(material_id),
    measurement_id INT REFERENCES measurements(measurement_id),
    color_id INT REFERENCES colors(color_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    material_id INTEGER REFERENCES materials(material_id),
    measurement_id INTEGER REFERENCES measurements(measurement_id),
    color_id INTEGER REFERENCES colors(color_id)
);
